rows.label: qst200223_msg0001
rows.name:
Harghal, why are you mixing yourself
up in all this shady business?

rows.label: qst200223_msg0002
rows.name:
Everyone's worried about you.
Your old friend Krujah.
Your own mother!

rows.label: qst200223_msg0004
rows.name:
If this plan works out, I'll be able
to make a mountain of cash.

rows.label: qst200223_msg0005
rows.name:
A single can of Bolla Bolla has the
power of ten Pollen Orbs, you know?

rows.label: qst200223_msg0007
rows.name:
All sorts of people would pay a high
price for such a potent drink.

rows.label: qst200223_msg0008
rows.name:
Even without Bahn, I won't have to
worry about money any more.

rows.label: qst200223_msg0009
rows.name: Why is money so important to you?!

rows.label: qst200223_msg0010
rows.name:
Why is money important?!
Money is everything in this world!

rows.label: qst200223_msg0011
rows.name:
Without money, you can't get anything
for yourself. Least of all happiness.

rows.label: qst200223_msg0012
rows.name:
If you met my mother, you should
know that. She needs money just to
stop her sickness from killing her!

rows.label: qst200223_msg0013
rows.name:
And where do you get off, anyway?!
Going on about your precious "justice"!

rows.label: qst200223_msg0014
rows.name:
I know smuggling isn't something to be
proud of! But what choice do I have?!

rows.label: qst200223_msg0015
rows.name:
It's the only way I can get
the money I need!

rows.label: qst200223_msg0016
rows.name:
Do you really believe earning money
in this way will bring you happiness?!

rows.label: qst200223_msg0017
rows.name:
Will dirty money really buy happiness
for the people you care about?!
